title: Senior Commercial Construction Estimator - Light Commercial
job_overview:
We are seeking an experienced Project Estimator who can hit the ground running and play a vital role in driving our company's growth. The ideal candidate will have a strong construction background and possess the skills to accurately estimate project costs, including labor, materials, and related expenses

Key Responsibilities:

Conduct comprehensive evaluations of project requirements, specifications, and drawings to determine the scope of work and estimate project costs.
Utilize construction background and industry knowledge to accurately estimate labor, material, equipment, and subcontractor costs.
Collaborate with project managers, architects, engineers, and stakeholders to gather relevant information and clarify project requirements.
Identify potential risks and challenges in project execution and incorporate them into the estimation process.
Analyze historical data and benchmarks to improve estimating accuracy and processes.
Prepare and present detailed cost estimates, proposals, and bid documents, utilizing on-screen take-off software.
Prepare detailed critical path job schedules.

Requirements

5+ years of construction estimating experience.
Proficiency with commercial estimating software.

Extensive knowledge of industry practices, procedures, and market trends.
Dedication, organizational skills, and the ability to plan, prioritize, and manage multiple tasks.
Attention to detail and focus on quality and accuracy.

Types of Projects:

As Prime Contractor:
Tenant Build outs Less than 15,000 SF
Exterior Renovations
Retrofits
Light commercial Ground up

As a sub-contractor:
Painting
Flooring
Tile
